name: OldWood Plex Web app 2.0
description:
A dark gray wood theme Completely Integrated for PlexPy, Plex WebApp and Plex.Tv - Forums & Blogs. Includes support for the Chrome Transmogrify extension. 

Completely Integrated theme for PlexPy, Plex WebApp, Plex.Tv & Plex Forums
>> Includes support for Transmission 2.92 (14714) Web interface (if installed) <<
additional_info:
Enter the ip's of your plex, PlexPy & Transmission server if installed or leave default :: localhost

Chrome Transmogrify Extension is required for the Actors and Movie details

# v.1.0 Initial release.
# v.2.0 Major Update: Integrated Support for PlexPy, Plex.tv, Blog & Forum
# v.2.1 Includes support for Transmission 2.92 (14714) Web interface (if installed)
# v.1.2.1a Small update to support latest web app release
# v.2.0 Full support for Plex Web App includes full page background images and more...

** Currently (Web) Updated Plex Web to  3.6.0 **
